Identifier.description: A user defined identifier for the investigation. MetaboLights does not use this value

title.description: A title for the Investigation. MetaboLights does not use this value

description.description: A brief description of the investigation aims. MetaboLights does not use this value

submissionDate.description: The date the investigation was submitted. MetaboLights does not use this value

publicReleaseDate.description: The date the investigation was release publicly. MetaboLights does not use this value

Created With Configuration.description: A field indicating which ISA configuration was used to create the ISAtab file. MetaboLights use this value for validation purposes

Last Opened With Configuration.description: A field indicating which ISA configuration was last used to open the ISAtab file. MetaboLights use this value for validation purposes

pubMedID.description: The PubMed ID related to this publication (if available). MetaboLights does not use this value

doi.description: The DOI related to this publication (if available). MetaboLights does not use this value

authorList.description: The authors who contributed to this publication. MetaboLights does not use this value

title.description: The title of the publication. MetaboLights does not use this value

status.description: The status of this publication, e.g. Published, Submitted, etc. MetaboLights does not use this value

lastName.description: The last name/surname of the contact. MetaboLights does not use this value

firstName.description: The first name/forename of the contact. MetaboLights does not use this value

midInitials.description: The mid initial of the contact. MetaboLights does not use this value

email.description: The email corresponding to this contact. MetaboLights does not use this value

phone.description: A phone number for this contact, if available. MetaboLights does not use this value

fax.description: A fax number for this contact, if available.MetaboLights does not use this value

address.description: The address for this contact, preferably, their institution. MetaboLights does not use this value

affiliation.description: The affiliation for this contact. MetaboLights does not use this value

roles.description: The role of the person in this investigation. MetaboLights does not use this value

identifier.description: Initially a user defined identifier for the study. This study id will be replaced with a MetaboLights ID (MTBLS) when uploaded to MetaboLights

rules.error: Study identifier should be at least 8 characters long
Study identifier must start with MTBLS, followed by a number. Example: MTBLS350

title.description: A title for the Study. Please use the same title as the first publication
title.placeholder: Metabolic study of Diabetes in Homo sapiens...

rules.error: Study title should be at least 8 characters long. Please use the same title as the first publication
Study title should be the same title as the main publication

description.description: A brief description of the study aims. Please using the abstract of the publication
description.placeholder: Please provide a description of your experiment, why not use the abstract of your paper

rules.error: Study description should be at least 60 characters long. Please using the abstract of the publication

submissionDate.description: The date the study was submitted. Automatically created by MetaboLights

publicReleaseDate.description: The date the study is scheduled to/was released publicly. Please keep in mind this is just a suggested date, not a commitment on MetaboLights side to publish on this date

rules.error: The study publication date must be in the future. This is provided by the submitter, but is only considered a suggestion

filename.description: The name of the study sample file linked to this Study.

rules.error: The study filename must be minimum 14 characters long
The study filename must be provided and be in this pattern s_{study identifier}.txt

pubMedID.description: The PubMed ID related to this publication (if available).

rules.error: Please only provide the id number, not prefixed with PMID:

doi.description: The DOI related to this publication (if available). DOI only, do not include http://dx.doi.org/

rules.error: Please only provide the DOI, not the URL/http address

authorList.description: The authors who contributed to this publication. As appears in the publication, do not include affiliation

rules.error: Please only a list of authors, separated by commas
Please provide the (tentaive) title of your publication. This should be a minimum of 25 characters long

status.description: The status of this publication, e.g. Published, Submitted, etc.

rules.error: Please provide the publication status of your publication. This should be a minimum of 5 characters long

lastName.description: The last name/surname of the contact

rules.error: The last name/surname of the contact. This should be a minimum of 2 characters long

firstName.description: The first name/forename of the contact

rules.error: The first name/forename of the contact. This should be a minimum of 2 characters long

midInitials.description: The mid initial of the contact.

rules.error: The middle initial of the contact. This should be a minimum of 1 characters long

email.description: The email corresponding to this contact.

rules.error: Please provide an email address for the contact. This should be a minimum of 7 characters long
Please provide a valid email address for the contact. This should include something like 'name@something.somewhere'

phone.description: An international phone number for this contact, if available.

rules.error: Please provide an international phone number for this contact. This should be a minimum of 10 numbers long

fax.description: A fax number for this contact, if available.

rules.error: Please provide an international Fax number for this contact. This should be a minimum of 10 numbers long

address.description: The address for this contact, preferably, their institution.

rules.error: Please provide an institutional ddress for this contact. This should be a minimum of 30 characters long
Please provide an institutional affiliation for this contact. This should be a minimum of 30 characters long

roles.description: The role of the person in this Study.

rules.error: Please provide an institutional affiliation for this contact. This should be a minimum of 30 characters long

factorName.description: The name of the Factor driving this study, e.g. Dose, Collection Time Point, Compound, and so forth

rules.error: Please provide an descrition of the factor. This should be a minimum of 5 characters long

factorType.description: The type of the Factor driving this study, e.g. EFO:Dose (from Ontology), etc.

rules.error: Please provide a valid ontology term for the factor. This should be a minimum of 5 characters long

studyDesignDescriptors.description: The type of study design being employed, Metabolomics/Metabonomics, Lipidomics, Metabolic Footprinting, Metabolic Fingerprinting, Targeted Profiling, Global Profiling.

rules.error: Please provide a valid ontology term for the factor. This should be a minimum of 5 characters long

measurementType.description: The measurement being observed in this assay, e.g. Transcription Profiling, Metabolite Profiling

rules.error: Please provide on of the following: metabolite profiling,isotopomer analysis,isotopologue distribution analysis

technologyType.description: The technology being employed to observe this measurement, e.g. NMR, Mass Spectrometry and so forth

rules.error: Please provide on of the following: mass spectrometry, NMR spectroscopy

technologyPlatform.description: The technology platform used, e.g. Affymetrix, Illumina, Solexa, SOLiD, Bruker, etc.

rules.error: Please provide the name of the technology platform used. This has to be atleast 3 characters long

filename.description: The name of the file which contains the information about this assay, the samples and pipeline use

rules.error: The assay filename must be minimum 14 characters long
The study filename must be provided and be in this pattern a_{study identifier}.txt

name.description: The name of the protocol, e.g. Samples Collection, Extraction Protocol
name.placeholder: Sample collection, Mass spectrometry, Data transformation, ...

rules.value: Sample collection|Extraction|NMR sample|Sample collection|NMR spectroscopy|Mass spectrometry|NMR assay|MS assay|Data transformation|Metabolite identification
rules.error: Please provide the name of the technology platform used. This has to be atleast 3 characters long

protocolType.description: The type of the protocol, preferably coming from an Ontology, e.g. Extraction Protocol
protocolType.placeholder: Sample collection, Mass spectrometry, Data transformation, ...

rules.value: Sample collection|Extraction|NMR sample|Sample collection|NMR spectroscopy|Mass spectrometry|NMR assay|MS assay|Data transformation|Metabolite identification
rules.error: Please provide the name of the technology platform used. This has to be atleast 3 characters long

description.description: A detailed description of the Protocol.

rules.error: Please provide a detailed descrition of the protocol. This has to be at least 14 characters long

uri.description: A URI to link out to a publication, web page, etc. describing the protocol.

version.description: The version of the protocol used, where applicable.

parameters.description: The parameters used when executing this protocol.

rules.error: Please provide a descrition of the analytical steps performed for this protocol. This has to be at least 10 characters long

components.description: The components used when carrying out this protocol.

rules.error: Please provide a descrition of the analytical steps performed for this protocol. This has to be at least 10 characters long

source name.description: Sources are considered as the starting biological material used in a study. Include QC if you have this information.
source name.placeholder: Batch1, Exp2, Urine1_calf, Volunteer7, pig serum 3, control_12

rules.error: Please provide a name for the sample source. Needs to be at least 4 characters long

Organism.description: Taxonomic information for the Biological material (for example, Species, genus, strain). Ideally, provide NCBI TaxID
Organism.placeholder: Homo sapiens, Arabidopsis thaliana, Mus musculus, etc.

rules.error: Please provide the taxonomic (latin) name for the sample. Please use 'Homo sapiens' not 'Human' etc. Needs to be at least 3 characters long. You can provide your own name if you can not find the correct organism name.

Variant.description: Full taxonomic name including strain, cultivar, <TODO, Add from MSI sheet from Steffen/Philippe>

organism part.description: The part of an organism's anatomy or substance, arising from an organism from which the biomaterial was derived. E.g. tissue, organ, system, sperm, blood, cell type, or body location (arm).

rules.error: Please provide a name for the sample source. Needs to be at least 2 characters long
This is a mandatory fixed field and can not be edited or removed

Sample Name.description: Samples represent major outputs resulting from a protocol application other than the special case outputs of Instrument or a Sample extract

rules.error: Please provide a descriptive name for the sample. Needs to be at least 4 characters long
Please provide a descriptive name for the sample. This should not be longer than 50 characters

Sample Name.description: Samples represent major outputs resulting from a protocol application other than the special case outputs of Instrument or a sample extract.

rules.error: Sample names must match the sample names provided earlier. Please update the main sample list if required
This is a mandatory fixed field and can not be edited or removed
The Extraction protocol must be defined in the investigation section of the study

Post Extraction.description: Extract concentration, Samples enrichment and resuspension processes e.g Dried under nitrogen, resuspended in H2O or pyridine, SPE column
Post Extraction.placeholder: Dried under nitrogen, resuspended in H2O, ...

rules.error: Please provide a description of the Post Extraction steps in your study. This fiel must be at least 10 characters long

Extraction Method.description: extraction method used. e.g methanol/chloroform extration (1:1 v/v)

rules.error: Please provide a description of the Extraction Method steps in your study. This fiel must be at least 10 characters long
Please provide a description of the Derivatization steps in your study. This fiel must be at least 10 characters long

Extract Name.description: User-defined names for each portion of extracted material.

rules.error: Please provide a description of the Derivatization steps in your study. This fiel must be at least 3 characters long
This is a mandatory fixed field and can not be edited or removed. Use 'Chromatography'
The 'Chromatography' descrption in the investigation part of your study should be used

Chromatography Instrument.placeholder: Shimadzu Nexera X2 UHPLC system, Thermo Scientific Dionex Ultimate 3000 HPLC system,....

rules.error: Please provide a description of the Chromatography Instrument. This field must be at least 20 characters long

Column model.description: Model or make of the of Column used
Column model.placeholder: Accucore HILIC (2.6 m, 2.1 mm x 50 mm; Thermo Scientific), Ascentis Express C18 (2.7 m, 4.6 mm x 100 mm; Supelco)....

rules.error: Please provide a description of the model and make of the of Column used. This field must be at least 20 characters long
Please provide a description of the Column type used. This field must be at least 5 characters long
This field should be defined in our sample sheet

Label.description: Indicates a chemical or biological marker, such as a radioactive isotope or a fluorescent dye which is bound to a material in order to make it detectable by some assay technology

rules.error: Please describe the chemical or biological marker using an ontology term. This field must be at least 5 characters long
This is a mandatory fixed field and can not be edited or removed. Use 'NMR sample'
The 'NMR sample' descrption in the investigation part of your study should be used

NMR tube type.placeholder: 1.7 mm (Norell), 5 mm standard, 5 mm conventional, Shigemi, mircocell, ...

rules.error: Please describe the NRM tube type using an ontology term. This field must be at least 5 characters long

Solvent.placeholder: 0.02 M phosphate buffered D2O, 0.9% NaCl in D2O, ...

rules.error: Please describe the solvent using an ontology term. This field must be at least 10 characters long
Please describe the pH value of the sample to one decimal

Temperature.description: Sample temperature run in the magnet, in Kelvin

rules.error: Please describe the temperature in Kelvin
Please describe the pH value of the sample to one decimal
This unit field must be preceded by the field where you recorded the temperature
This field should be defined in our sample sheet

Label.description: Indicates a chemical or biological marker or observed nucleus

rules.error: Please describe the chemical or biological marker using an ontology term. This field must be at least 5 characters long
This is a mandatory fixed field and can not be edited or removed. Use 'Mass spectrometry'
The 'Mass spectrometry' descrption in the investigation part of your study should be used

Scan polarity.description: An acquisition mode to which specifies weather polarity is negative, positive or alternating.

rules.error: Please describe the acquisition mode. This field must be one of positive, negative, alternating, n/a

Scan m/z range.description: The limit of m/z over which a mass spectrometer can detect ions.

rules.error: Please describe the m/z range. This field must contain the lover and higher values, like this '200-1000'

Instrument.description: The name of the mass spectrometry instrument, manufacturer, model # operational software name operational software version
Instrument.placeholder: AB SCIEX TripleTOF 5600+, Agilent 6530 Accurate-Mass Q-TOF

rules.error: Please give a detailed description of the mass spectrometry instrument. This field must be at least 15 characters long

Ion source.description: The ion source use PSI-MS cv Ionization mode (EI, APCI, ESI#), vacuum pressure skimmer/focusing lens voltages (e.g. capillary voltage etc.) gas flows (e.g. nebulization gas, cone gas etc.) source temperature

rules.error: Please describe the ion source using an ontology term. This field must be at least 15 characters long

Mass analyzer.description: the analyzer(s) used by the mass spectrometer, use PSI-MS ontology terms

rules.error: Please describe the mass analyzer source using an ontology term. This field must be at least 15 characters long

MS Assay Name.description: User-defined name for a MS assay.

rules.error: Please describe your ms assay name, which may vary from source name if using replicates. This field must be at least 5 characters long

Raw Spectral Data File.description: Name of the raw spectral data file generated by an assay. Do not include any folder names, only the filename.

rules.error: Please add the raw file name for this sample. This field must be at least 5 characters long
This is a mandatory fixed field and can not be edited or removed. Use 'NMR assay'
The 'NMR assay' descrption in the investigation part of your study should be used

NMR Assay Name.description: User-defined name for a NMR assay.

rules.error: Please describe your nmr assay name, which may vary from source name if using replicates. This field must be at least 5 characters long

Free Induction Decay Data File.description: Name of the free induction decay data file gathered for this assay.

rules.error: Please add the fid file name for this sample. This field must be at least 5 characters long
This is a mandatory fixed field and can not be edited or removed. Use 'NMR spectroscopy'
The 'NMR spectroscopy' descrption in the investigation part of your study should be used

Instrument.description: Name and model of the NMR instrument

rules.error: Please describe the NMR instrument using an ontology term. This field must be at least 5 characters long

NMR Probe.description: Type of probe fitted to the spectroscope

rules.error: Please describe the NMR probe using an ontology term. This field must be at least 5 characters long

Number of transients.description: Number of transients (scan) acquired for your experiment.

rules.error: Please describe the number of transients (scan) acquired for your experiment

Pulse sequence name.description: Pulse sequence used to acquire the data

rules.error: Please describe pulse sequence name used for your experiment

Magnetic field strength.description: a parameter expressed in Tesla to report the strength of the field

rules.error: Please describe the magnetic field strength used for your experiment, to one decimal if possible
Please describe the temperature in Tesla
This unit field must be preceded by the field where you recorded the stength of the field

Acquisition Parameter Data File.description: Name of the acquisition parameter data file gathered for this assay.

rules.error: Please add the acquisition parameter datafile name for this sample. This field must be at least 5 characters long
This is a mandatory fixed field and can not be edited or removed. Use 'Data transformation'
The 'Data transformation' descrption in the investigation part of your study should be used

Normalization Name.description: User-defined name for each normalization applied

rules.error: Please add the normalization name. This field must be at least 5 characters long

Derived Spectral Data File.description: Name of the derived data file generated from spectral data by an assay. Do not include any folder names, only the filename.

rules.error: Please add the derived (nmrML/mzML/imzML) file name for this sample. This field must be at least 5 characters long
This is a mandatory fixed field and can not be edited or removed
The Metabolite identification must be defined in the investigation section of the study

Data Transformation Name.description: User-defined name for each data transformation applied

rules.error: Please add the data transformation name. This field must be at least 5 characters long

Metabolite Assignment File.description: Name of the metabolite assignment file gathered for this assay. Do not include any folder names, only the filename.

rules.error: The study filename must be minimum 15 characters long
The metabolite annotation filename must be provided and be in this pattern 'm_{assays.annotationValue} {assays.technologyType.annotationValue}_v2_maf.tsv'
